aria-describedby.description: Refers to the `id` of the element that labels the radio element.
aria-describedby.description_zh: 指标记 radio 元素的元素的 'id'。

colorScheme.type: whiteAlpha / blackAlpha / gray / red / orange / yellow / green / teal / blue / cyan / purple / pink
colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component

defaultChecked.description: If `true`, the radio will be initially checked.
defaultChecked.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则最初将检查单选按钮。

id.description_zh: 分配给 input 的 ID

inputProps.description: Additional props to be forwarded to the `input` element
inputProps.description_zh: 要转发到 'input' 元素的其他 props

isChecked.description:
If `true`, the radio will be checked.
You'll need to pass `onChange` to update its value (since it is now controlled)
isChecked.description_zh:
如果为 'true'，则将检查单选按钮。
您需要传递 'onChange' 来更新其值（因为它现在是受控的）

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the radio will be disabled

isFocusable.description:
If `true` and `isDisabled` is true, the radio will remain
focusable but not interactive.
isFocusable.description_zh:
如果 'true' 和 'isDisabled' 为 true，则无线电将保持
可聚焦但不是交互式的。

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the radio button will be invalid. This also sets `aria-invalid` to `true`.
isInvalid.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则单选按钮将无效。这也会将 'aria-invalid' 设置为 'true'。

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the radio will be read-only
isReadOnly.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则无线电将为只读

isRequired.description: If `true`, the radio button will be required. This also sets `aria-required` to `true`.
isRequired.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则需要单选按钮。这也会将 'aria-required' 设置为 'true'。

name.description:
The name of the input field in a radio
(Useful for form submission).
name.description_zh:
单选按钮中输入字段的名称
（用于表单提交）。

onChange.description: Function called when checked state of the `input` changes
onChange.description_zh: 当 'input' 的选中状态发生变化时调用的函数

spacing.description: The spacing between the checkbox and its label text
spacing.description_zh: 复选框与其标签文本之间的间距

value.description:
The value to be used in the radio button.
This is the value that will be returned on form submission.
value.description_zh:
要在单选按钮中使用的值。
这是表单提交时将返回的值。
